name: Rules and Regulations
description:
Rules and regulations are a necessity for maintaining order.

So here's a 2D shooter game with new rules and regulations.

You can shoot, jump, and have as much fun as you want... just as long as you follow the rules...

Music: Evan King - Triceps
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCT1ZkP03V18LmOj8zbyP-Dw?
https://www.twitter.com/evankingaudio
